name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 027
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, The Truth Is Out There. It's official, the X-Files was right, and with the new UFO report released by the US Government claiming they "could not rule out UFO's as a possibility," extraterrestrial life seems as close to a reality as ever. Of the 144 reports catalogued that were reviewed, the government was only able to identify 1 of them. Color palette inspired by the X-Files.
